name: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Two - Atlas Mugged
name_original: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Two - Atlas Mugged
description:
Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Two - Atlas Mugged is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games and Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2015. Telltale Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Two - Atlas Mugged is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
